ygData.subject: Re: Banshee vs Pets
ygData.msgSnippet: ... thought ... opponent ... SK. I ... this ... pop ... Actually, come to think of it, I like the damage shield idea even better than the lifetap series. Ok,
ygData.messageBody:
> Well put Beld. I think we should all realize that SK's are not meant to be
> healers like paladins and rangers to some extent. We are the hybrid that
> focuses on dmg and killing foes. I agree though that pets have to be
thought
> out more about their usefulness and maybe even replaced with weak buffs or
> DoT's. Heart flutter would be a great addition as it not only dmg's
opponent
> but also weakens its stats and those are two of the main aspects of the
SK. I
> also liked the idea of a dmg shield, maybe at 30. Banshee aura would fit
this
> perfectly as it is self cast and wouldnt be TOO powerful at only 8dmg a
pop
> to unbalance classes. Just my thoughts.

Actually, come to think of it, I like the damage shield idea even better
than the lifetap series. Ok, so healing and any type of downtime reduction
is right out, I can live with that (I got used to it, played a mostly-solo
warrior to 31). But Banshee Aura (et. al) would be wonderful! Rangers get
thorns, dangit, let me chill some kobolds to the bone! It's also more damage
we can put out, HENCE Beld wouldn't mind it. Go damage shields go! Good
thinking, man!

Btw, the only 39 spell I'm looking forward to is Heart Flutter, all the
others are, well... crap. (sorry Brian) Cancel Magic, ok for those dots that
just won't come off. Shadow Vortex, gimme a break, no one EVER uses that
spell. Pet spell, shah right. Shield Skin, heh what a joke, absorb one hit
for a ton of mana AND reagents, no thanks my 136 Agi will do a better job
for free. And the list goes on...

Dravith Vandre'i
